subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick won for the third time in his four Nascar  truck races this season, taking the Camping World Series 200 with a near wire-to-wire victory.
snippet: Kevin Harvick won for the third time in his four Nascar  truck races this season, taking the Camping World Series 200 with a near wire-to-wire victory.
